Posts.Content: You fought for everyone else that has cancer too, and you should be proud of yourself that you are showing hope and faith through your bravery to all of us. God Bless you and thank you for sharing with me!!
Posts.Title: I AM BLESSED!

Posts.Content: hi there! Yes, I have had breast pain and pain in my armpit. Unfortunately, mine turned out to be cancer. I believe you have done the best thing possible which was to have a mammogram. Many things can show up on a mammogram, including calcifications and fibrous cysts both being benign (not cancer). I hope all goes well with you and you are in my prayers. The ultrasound, by the way, gives the doctors a better view of what is going on beneath the skin. Sometimes one scan or xray just isn't enough. I can tell you to try to keep your mind busy as waiting for results will drive you madly insane. God bless, Angelpie
Posts.Title: Me
